mapper.update: update t_park set grid_code = #{gridCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manager_code = #{managerCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city_code = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city_name = #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_code = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_name = #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, building_num = #{buildingNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, logo_src = #{logoSrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, grid_code, manager_code, code, `name`, city_code, city_name, area_code, area_name, address, building_num, logo_src from t_park where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, grid_code, manager_code, code, `name`, city_code, city_name, area_code, area_name, address, building_num, logo_src from t_park

select id, grid_code, manager_code, code as parkCode, `name` as parkName, city_code, city_name, area_code, area_name, address, building_num, logo_src from t_park where manager_code=#{managerCode}
and name like concat('%', #{parkName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
SELECT c.park_code code,COUNT(DISTINCT c.building_code) building_num FROM t_company c GROUP BY c.park_code
